title: Organic Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Take-out, British, English
description: Small shop and take-away deli service with tables upstairs and outside, located off Low Pavement, in the town center. The deli salads differ from day to day. Shop stocks fresh produce, chilled & frozen products, alternative magazines, and sells home products like ecological toiletries & detergents. Previously named Organic Heaven. Jun 2015 owner reported removed meat from menu, now it's all-veg.
